content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Area (Position 0,0 to 2,0)
Consists of two stone furnaces:
- Furnace 1 at (0,0)
- Furnace 2 at (2,0)
Both furnaces are set up for iron plate production

### Copper Plate Production Area (Position 4,4 to 6,4)
Consists of two stone furnaces:
- Furnace 1 at (4,4)
- Furnace 2 at (6,4)
Both furnaces are set up for copper plate production

### Power Generation System (Position -9.5,24.5 to 4.5,24.5)
Complex power generation setup consisting of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5,24.5)
- Boiler at (-2.5,24.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,24.5)
- Two pipe networks:
  - Water system (ID 2913) connecting offshore pump to boiler
  - Steam system (ID 2914) connecting boiler to steam engine
- Electric pole network (ID 3048) with poles at multiple positions including (8.5,2.5), (8.5,10.5), (8.5,6.5), (8.5,14.5), (8.5,18.5), (6.5,24.5)

### Research Facility
- Main lab at position (10.5,0.5)
- Connected to power grid
- Currently set up for automation science pack research

ERROR TIPS

### Resource Management Errors
- Ensure coal supply is maintained for power system and furnaces
- Monitor ore supplies to prevent furnaces from running empty

### Entity Placement Errors
- When placing labs, ensure the target location is clear of other entities
- Verify that required items are in inventory before attempting to place entities

### Power System Errors
- Maintain constant coal supply in boiler to prevent power outages
- Monitor steam and water pipe connections to ensure proper flow

### Research System Errors
- Check if technology is already researched before attempting to research it again
- Ensure proper power connection to labs before starting research

### Inventory Management
- Keep track of required materials for crafting before starting crafting operations
- Maintain sufficient ore supplies for continuous production
